fr.cnes.doi.plugin.impl.db

Class DefaultUserRoleImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • fr.cnes.doi.db.AbstractUserRoleDBHelper
        • fr.cnes.doi.plugin.AbstractUserRolePluginHelper
          • fr.cnes.doi.plugin.impl.db.DefaultUserRoleImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PluginConfiguration, PluginMetadata

    public final class DefaultUserRoleImpl
extends AbstractUserRolePluginHelper
    Default implementation of the authentication plugin. This implementation defines users/groups/roles.
    Author:
    Jean-Christophe Malapert (jean-christophe.malapert@cnes.fr)
